EmailTemplate.subject: Completing your NCS application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Completing {!Contact.FirstName}'s NCS application
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
It’s great that {!Contact.FirstName} wants to take part in NCS. We are The Challenge and we'll be running NCS in your area this summer.
Your next steps Click here to log in online and use your unique login details below to complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application: Your NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c} Your parent or guardian activation code: {!Contact.PG_NCS_PIN__c}
Please note that these login details should only be used by the parent or guardian to complete the application. The young person has separate login details because, whilst they can enter initial details, they cannot complete most of the application.
It’s quicker to apply online but if you would like a paper application form, please contact us using the details below.
Any questions? Take a look at questions.ncsthechallenge.org, or get in touch by calling 0203 542 2400 or by emailing contact@ncsthechallenge.org.
Make sure {!Contact.FirstName} doesn't miss out!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
